original_title: Per tutto il tempo che ci resta
overview: Giorgio Nappi is a 50-year-old prosecutor who has struggled for years against the power of Mafia gangs, coming out almost always defeated. But there is one last case he must deal with before he retires: in his hometown, a 12-year-old girl has been raped, and she accuses a priest, Father Francis, Giorgio's best friend.
title: Per tutto il tempo che ci resta
